> Hiya! 
>
> My name is Rosy! Iâ€™m a visually impaired artist who draws and writes a lot. It would appear youâ€™ve become trapped in my gay little labyrinthâ€” I mean art page. This is my art page). My main style is cartoony, but I can do just about anything with the right effort. Appealing color pallets and stained glass are my specialties. 
> 
> If youâ€™d like to commission me, my dms are open and my information is [[[https://rosyfox2002.carrd.co/#digital |here]]]!
